original_text:
Book of Books
Sei pronto a nascondere e proteggere uno dei più importanti simboli di cultura e conoscenza? La slot Book of Books è il nuovo gioco firmato da Yggdrasil, che ti offre la possibilità di divertirti con il Libro dei Libri, che tra un giro e l’altro mette in palio una vincita potenziale fino a 10.000 volte la puntata!
Tra simboli Scatter e Wild, giri gratuiti e simboli in espansione, puoi divertirti a sbloccare funzionalità aggiuntive interessanti che aumentano l’emozione del gioco. Scopri di più!
Grafica della slot Book of Books
Book of Books ha un RTP al 96,10%, una struttura con griglia 5×3 e un massimo di 40 linee di pagamento. Abbiamo un blocco di pietra che incornicia i rulli, mostrando lievemente un’ambientazione che è molto buia e misteriosa. A conquistare l’attenzione è uno dei personaggi dell’Ordine Peregrino creati dal provider: si tratta di un uomo che suona uno strumento, accompagnato da altri 2 “guardiani” che si posizionano sempre ai lati della griglia.
Sui rulli troviamo non solo i semi delle carte, ma anche una mazza, una spada, un cavaliere, un anziano e un re, il cui valore va da 10x e 75x la puntata per cinque icone in una combinazione. Jolly e Scatter sono la ciliegina sulla torta!
Caratteristiche di gioco e funzioni
Con lo Scatter (il libro d’oro) ricevi un Power Up che puoi utilizzare nella funzione Free Spin, capace di potenziare quindi con uno o 2 giri gratis in più, un simbolo ad espansione e un moltiplicatore più alto.
Per quanto riguarda i giri gratis abbiamo 7 giri gratuiti, con la griglia di gioco si espande durante la funzione con un numero di righe e linee di pagamento aggiuntive in base a quanti Scatter trovi. Con 3 Scatter hai 3 righe e 10 linee; con 4 invece hai 4 righe e 20 linee di pagamento; infine con 5 Scatter si sale a 5 righe e 40 linee di pagamento.
Ricorda che puoi accedere direttamente al round bonus acquistandolo in qualsiasi momento nel gioco base.
Considerazioni finali
Come ogni altra “Book of..” che si rispetti, la slot Book of Books riesce a non deludere le aspettative. Indubbiamente però per massimizzare il livello di divertimento bisogna sperare di attivare i giri gratis.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la vincita massima che si ottiene con la slot Book of Books?

Il potenziale di vincita di questa slot è pari a 10.000 volte la scommessa.



Qual è il punto di forza della slot online?

Giocano un ruolo chiave i simboli Wild e gli Scatter, ma non dimentichiamo poi i giri gratuiti riattivabili con una serie di potenziamenti speciali.



Posso giocare alla slot Book of Books gratis?

Sì, attraverso i migliori casinò online e direttamente sul nostro portale, senza perdere tempo per le ricerche della sua versione demo.

raw_translation.response:
Are you ready to hide and protect one of the most important symbols of culture and knowledge? Book of Books is the new game from Yggdrasil that offers you the chance to have fun with the Book of Books, which can potentially win you up to 10,000 times your bet!
With Scatter and Wild symbols, free spins, and expanding symbols, you can unlock interesting additional features that increase the excitement of the game. Discover more!
Graphics of the Book of Books slot
Book of Books has an RTP of 96.10%, a 5x3 grid structure, and a maximum of 40 paylines. We have a block of stone that frames the reels, showing a dark and mysterious setting. One of the Peregrine Order characters created by the provider captures attention: a man playing an instrument, accompanied by two "guards" who always position themselves on either side of the grid.
On the reels, we find not only the card suits but also a mace, a sword, a knight, an elder, and a king, whose value ranges from 10x to 75x the bet for five icons in a combination. The cherry on top is the Wild and Scatter symbols!
Game Features and Functions
With the Scatter (the golden book), you receive a Power Up that you can use in the Free Spin function, which can enhance with one or 2 extra free spins, an expanding symbol, and a higher multiplier.
As for free spins, we have 7 free spins, with the game grid expanding during the function with a number of additional rows and paylines based on how many Scatters you find. With 3 Scatters, you have 3 rows and 10 paylines; with 4, you have 4 rows and 20 paylines; and finally, with 5 Scatters, you get 5 rows and 40 paylines.
Remember that you can access the bonus round directly by purchasing it at any time during the base game.
Final Thoughts
Like any other "Book of..." slot worth its salt, the Book of Books slot manages not to disappoint expectations. However, to maximize the level of fun, you need to hope to activate the free spins.

FAQs
What is the maximum win you can get with the Book of Books slot?

The potential win of this slot is up to 10,000 times the bet.

What is the strength of the online slot?

The Wild and Scatter symbols play a key role, but don't forget about the free spins that can be reactivated with a series of special enhancements.

Can I play the Book of Books slot for free?

Yes, through the best online casinos and directly on our portal, without wasting time searching for the demo version.

Graphics of the Book of Books slot
Book of Books has an RTP of 96.10%, a 5x3 grid structure, and a maximum of 40 paylines. We have a block of stone that frames the reels, showing a dark and mysterious setting. One of the Peregrine Order characters created by the provider captures attention: a man playing an instrument, accompanied by two "guards" who always position themselves on either side of the grid.
On the reels, we find not only the card suits but also a mace, a sword, a knight, an elder, and a king, whose value ranges from 10x to 75x the bet for five icons in a combination. The cherry on top is the Wild and Scatter symbols!
Game Features and Functions
With the Scatter (the golden book), you receive a Power Up that you can use in the Free Spin function, which can enhance with one or 2 extra free spins, an expanding symbol, and a higher multiplier.
As for free spins, we have 7 free spins, with the game grid expanding during the function with a number of additional rows and paylines based on how many Scatters you find. With 3 Scatters, you have 3 rows and 10 paylines; with 4, you have 4 rows and 20 paylines; and finally, with 5 Scatters, you get 5 rows and 40 paylines.
Remember that you can access the bonus round directly by purchasing it at any time during the base game.
Final Thoughts
Like any other "Book of..." slot worth its salt, the Book of Books slot manages not to disappoint expectations. However, to maximize the level of fun, you need to hope to activate the free spins.

Are you ready to hide and protect one of the most important symbols of culture and knowledge? Look no further than the Book of Books slot game, the latest from Yggdrasil. With potential winnings of up to 10,000 times your bet, it's the perfect way to test your luck with this important tome. 

With Scatter and Wild symbols, free spins and expanding symbols, you'll have access to exciting additional features that will keep you on the edge of your seat. 

The graphics are truly stunning, with an RTP of 96.10%, a 5x3 grid and up to 40 paylines. The reels are framed by a stone block, setting the tone for a dark and mysterious adventure. One of the key highlights of the game is a character from the Peregrine Order, playing an instrument with two guardians flanking him on either side of the reels. 

In addition to the poker-card symbols, you'll also find a mace, sword, knight, elder and king, with a value ranging from 10x to 75x your bet for five icons in a combination. The Scatter and Wild symbols are the icing on the cake! 

By collecting Scatters in the form of golden books, players unlock a Power Up which can be used in the Free Spins mode, increasing the number of spins, expanding symbols and multipliers. The Free Spins mode also increases the grid and number of paylines, with up to 40 available for players who land five Scatters. 

For those in a hurry, the bonus round can be accessed directly through the purchase option in the base game. 

In summary, the Book of Books slot game delivers on all fronts, delivering maximum excitement to players. Be sure to try your luck with the free demo before placing your bets.

With Scatter and Wild symbols, free spins, and expanding symbols, you can unlock interesting additional features that increase the excitement of the game. Discover more!
Graphics of the Book of Books slot
Book of Books has an RTP of 96.10%, a 5x3 grid structure, and a maximum of 40 paylines. We have a block of stone that frames the reels, showing a dark and mysterious setting. One of the Peregrine Order characters created by the provider captures attention: a man playing an instrument, accompanied by two "guards" who always position themselves on either side of the grid.
On the reels, we find not only the card suits but also a mace, a sword, a knight, an elder, and a king, whose value ranges from 10x to 75x the bet for five icons in a combination. The cherry on top is the Wild and Scatter symbols!
Game Features and Functions
With the Scatter (the golden book), you receive a Power Up that you can use in the Free Spin function, which can enhance with one or 2 extra free spins, an expanding symbol, and a higher multiplier.
As for free spins, we have 7 free spins, with the game grid expanding during the function with a number of additional rows and paylines based on how many Scatters you find. With 3 Scatters, you have 3 rows and 10 paylines; with 4, you have 4 rows and 20 paylines; and finally, with 5 Scatters, you get 5 rows and 40 paylines.
Remember that you can access the bonus round directly by purchasing it at any time during the base game.
Final Thoughts
Like any other "Book of..." slot worth its salt, the Book of Books slot manages not to disappoint expectations. However, to maximize the level of fun, you need to hope to activate the free spins.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Book of Books".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Are you ready to hide and protect one of the most important symbols of culture and knowledge? Book of Books is the new game from Yggdrasil that offers you the chance to have fun with the Book of Books, which can potentially win you up to 10,000 times your bet!
With Scatter and Wild symbols, free spins, and expanding symbols, you can unlock interesting additional features that increase the excitement of the game. Discover more!
Graphics of the Book of Books slot
Book of Books has an RTP of 96.10%, a 5x3 grid structure, and a maximum of 40 paylines. We have a block of stone that frames the reels, showing a dark and mysterious setting. One of the Peregrine Order characters created by the provider captures attention: a man playing an instrument, accompanied by two "guards" who always position themselves on either side of the grid.
On the reels, we find not only the card suits but also a mace, a sword, a knight, an elder, and a king, whose value ranges from 10x to 75x the bet for five icons in a combination. The cherry on top is the Wild and Scatter symbols!
Game Features and Functions
With the Scatter (the golden book), you receive a Power Up that you can use in the Free Spin function, which can enhance with one or 2 extra free spins, an expanding symbol, and a higher multiplier.
As for free spins, we have 7 free spins, with the game grid expanding during the function with a number of additional rows and paylines based on how many Scatters you find. With 3 Scatters, you have 3 rows and 10 paylines; with 4, you have 4 rows and 20 paylines; and finally, with 5 Scatters, you get 5 rows and 40 paylines.
Remember that you can access the bonus round directly by purchasing it at any time during the base game.
Final Thoughts
Like any other "Book of..." slot worth its salt, the Book of Books slot manages not to disappoint expectations. However, to maximize the level of fun, you need to hope to activate the free spins.

dalle-prompt.response: Prompt: Create a feature image fitting the game "Book of Books" in cartoon style featuring a happy Maya warrior with glasses. The background of the image should show a dark and mysterious setting, with a block of stone framing the reels. In the foreground, the Maya warrior should be holding the golden book scatter symbol while smiling and looking directly at the viewer. The warrior should be wearing traditional Maya clothing and accessories, including a feather headdress and beaded necklace. The image should convey a sense of excitement and adventure, with vibrant colors and bold lines to capture the attention of potential players.
